title: NIH 'very concerned' about serious side effect in coronavirus vaccine trial
author: Arthur Allen; Kaiser Health News; Liz Szabo
description: The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) is weighing whether to follow British regulators in resuming a coronavirus vaccine trial that was halted when a participant suffered spinal cord damage, even | While the FDA weighs whether to resume its trial of AstraZeneca's COVID-19 vaccine, which triggered a clinical hold last week after a U.K. patient was hit with a serious side effect, the NIH has launched its own study into the reaction—which could take up to two months to wrap, one NIH officer said.
